doc.title: 2600 metros
doc.plot: In Bogota, a city located 2600 meters above sea level, there's a newspaper called "2600 Metros" where everybody's the main news. This movie tells a one-day-story of a few group of people of different races and economical status, that'll find that they share more than just a simple geographical place. People who live "2600 meters closer to stars", but far away from happiness.
